metadata.name: Swirls of Psilocybin
metadata.description:
I always wanted to recreate the visual effect of Psilocybin. Thanks to an amazing fluid dynamic simulator, Verve Painter and a bit of animating magic, here it is. I could stare at this all day!

My opinion of Psilocybin is that if consumed responsibly in a safe environment and with people you love, you will come out of the trip a better person.  Mind opened and ego dissipated. Truly amazing, natural experience

The original is 4k and is a sight to behold, I'll send it to the buyer.

1/1,  hand painted on my Kanvas, 
1080 HD video in the NFT, original is 4k.
